reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater comfortable, lightweight, and well-fitting, appreciating that it's not oversized and works well for layering. Customers consider it good value for money, with one mentioning it feels elegant for the price.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific quality, fit and look--love this classic sweater
items.body: Awesome! That's what I thought when I put this sweater on after washing and hanging it to dry. It feels very soft. The sweater is thin, but cozy. The quality is exceptional for the price as is the fit. I bought size medium in the Navy Leopard Print. It fits perfectly--true to size. Truly, this sweater looks like I paid about ten times more than I actually did. Read more
items.author: Pam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My WFH dream top!!
items.body: I just got this delivered to me last night, wore it today and I’m about to order more in different colors. It’s the perfect fit for me: fitted just enough to not look like a sloppy bag but loose enough to be forgiving and bloated-tummy friendly. It’s got sleeves for cooler weather but it’s lightweight so not suffocating like a thick sweater can be when you’re indoors. It’s also super soft and soo comfortable. Lastly, the neckline!! I love a v-neck but always have a hard time finding any that are work appropriate without a cami top underneath. This v-neck is flattering and professional enough for my virtual meetings without feeling stuffy or overly buttoned up. Seriously this top is amazing. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars little bit thin, but otherwise nice.
items.body: soft, slinky fabric. Nicely stretchy. little bit thin. Read more
items.author: chromodynamica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice basic lightweight sweater that's really comfortable & cute!
items.body: I was wavering between medium & small & ended up going with the small size & am glad I did. I'm a 36 bust & the small fits perfectly! Actually I couldn't have asked for a better fit! I wanted a slimmer more fitted look & small is exactly that. It is not tight by any means but it isn't baggy or sloppy loose either. I can also wear a snug tank top underneath & the fit & look are right on. This sweater washed perfectly in the machine, cold water, on the gentle cycle then I dry it flat on a towel. I've already ordered 2 more colors & won't be surprised if my sweater drawer soon is home to every available color! You cannot beat the value here. I'm super happy & satisfied with my purchase & recommend this sweater 100%! Read more
items.author: Lorelyle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice!
items.body: Super sweater! This is lightweight as advertised. The fit is excellent. I'm 5'1" and 117 lbs. The small is great! I washed it on a permanent press cycle, and put it in the dryer for just a few minutes to get the wrinkles out, then laid it flat to finish drying. It is light enough to layer if you'd like. It's very comfortable and isn't scratchy at all. Love it! I bought 2 colors! Read more
items.author: BarbieJ

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A wardrobe basic
items.body: Nice basic sweater. A staple for your wardrobe. The material felt great until I washed it. It didn’t pill but that softness went away. It’s not itchy or scratchy but the softness is gone. I laid it flat to dry and then put it in the dryer for 10 minutes with dryer sheets and don’t help. O have 3 more in different color. I’ll try hand washing with Woolite. Read more
items.author: Bouge75

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice comfy casual sweater!!
items.body: Nice fit! True to size and great quality! A great essential to have in your wardrobe. The color is nice and washes up well!! Read more
items.author: Tonya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt for the cost
items.body: Great shirt and great value. Nice shirt that's definitely an upgrade from long sleeves t-shirts. Comfortable and fits well. Great length too Read more
items.author: Carrie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Neon Yellow, Dark Olive Heather, Dark Burgundy, Teal Blue Heather, Black, Sage Green Heather, Light Grey Heather White Rugby Stripe, Oatmeal Heather, Dark Golden Yellow, Navy White Rugby Stripe, White Cheetah, Pale Peach, Coral Pink, Dark Chestnut Brown Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
